701675f-a.folder: Putnam Place & Oval Reservoir East, Bronx, NY
701675f-a.text:
Putnam Place, at the S.E. corner of Reservoir Oval East, showing a 2.5-story stone house. The 5-story apartment house, only part of which is seen, stands at the S.W. corner of East Gunhill Road and bears No. 272 on the latter.

June 6, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701675f-a.title: Bronx: Putnam Place - Oval Reservoir East
